sections.text:
46-1125.Permit denial, suspension, revocation; grounds.

The district shall deny, refuse renewal of, suspend, or revoke a permit applied for or issued pursuant to section 46-1117 on any of the following grounds:

(1) Practice of fraud or deceit in obtaining a permit; or

(2) Violation of any of the provisions of the Nebraska Chemigation Act or any standards or rules and regulations adopted and promulgated pursuant to such act.

SourceLaws 1986, LB 284, ยง 25;Laws 2011, LB2, ยง 5.
